name: Lin Shang 0001
content: Dr. Lin Shang - Home Research Interests My main research lies in Computational Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Big Data in connection with Statistics, Engineering and Mathematics. Rough Sets and Granular Computing Evolutionary Computation Text Sentiment Analysis Video/Image Understanding Teaching Computational Intelligence (for graduates) Data Structures (for second-year undergraduates) Fundamentals of Programming (for first-year undergraduates) Artificial Intelligence (previous) Publications Here is my Google Scholar Profile, and here is my DBLP Publication List.
